## Library.Config type

A configuration object provided to [Library.create()](./design-token-library.library.create.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Config<T extends {}, R extends {} = T> = {
        [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends DesignToken.Any ? ConfigValue<T[K], R> : T[K] extends {} ? Config<T[K], R> : never;
    };
```
